name: Bougainvillea Apartment
address: 3rd Floor, 4 Vong Duc, Hang Bai, Hoan Kiem, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located 300 metres from Ba Dinh Square, Bougainvillea Apartment offers accommodation in Hanoi. The air-conditioned unit is 300 metres from Trang Tien Plaza. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property.

There is a dining area and a kitchen equipped with fridge. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is available. Other facilities at Bougainvillea Apartment include a terrace.

Hanoi Opera House is 500 metres from Bougainvillea Apartment, while Sofitel Legend Metropole Hotel is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
